name: glider production, passenger car | glider, passenger car | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/1639/documentation

This dataset describes the production of a passenger car glider. The glider includes: the body of the car, the steering, braking and suspension system, tyres, cockpit equipment (seats, belts, etc.) and  non propulsion related electronics. Entries are given per kg glider. The data has been derived for a glider of about 800kg, corresponding to a compact size car of approximately 1200 to 1400kg.

The dataset takes as input the raw materials and the energy inputs required for the production process and includes the production facility.

The dataset returns the finished glider as well as the output scrap fractions from the production process.
category: C:Manufacturing/29:Manufacture of motor vehicles, trailers and semi-trailers/291:Manufacture of motor vehicles/2910:Manufacture of motor vehicles

processDocumentation.technologyDescription: The dataset is based on averages over passenger car technologies spanning from 2000 to 2010 which are  expected to be representative up to 2015.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: The data analysed is taken from literature spanning between 2000 and 2010. The data is expected to be representative up to 2015 since no substantial changes could be observed in the materialisation of passenenger cars between 2000 and 2010. It is not expected that major changes will occur until 2015 in commercially available passenger cars.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Average of material compositions published in literature between 2000 and 2010.

exchanges.description: Materialization based on average from literature values.
